2016 2018

Arnaud Soullié

Cybersecurity R&D Manager at Wavestone

France

Biography

Arnaud Soullié (@arnaudsoullie) is the cybersecurity R&D manager at Wavestone. For 8 years, he has been performing security audits and pentest on all type of targets. He specializes in Industrial Control Systems and Active Directory security. He has spoken at numerous security conferences on ICS topics : BlackHat Europe, BruCon, 4SICS, BSides Las Vegas, DEFCON…He also has an interest in hardware security, and is the designer of DYODE (Do Your Own Diode): an open-source, low-cost, ICS oriented data diode.

Presentations

2016

DYODE: Do Your Own DiodE

Coming Soon.

Trainings

22-23 October 2018

Pentesting Industrial Control Systems

On this intense 2-days training, you will learn everything you need to start pentesting Industrial Control Networks. We will cover the basics to help you understand what are the most common ICS vulnerabilities. We will then spend some time learning and exploiting Windows & Active Directory weaknesses, as most ICS are controlled by Windows systems. We will cover the most common ICS protocols (Modbus,...
